description: This file sets up an AI agent with specific tools, memory, and configuration, and executes responses based on user prompts.

classes.name: Memory
classes.description: Manages the memory storage for the agent, using a SQLite database.

classes.name: Agent
classes.description: Represents the AI agent configured with models, tools, and memory.

classes.name: Claude
classes.description: A model class representing the Claude language model used by the agent.

classes.name: ReasoningTools
classes.description: Provides reasoning capabilities as a tool for the agent.

classes.name: YFinanceTools
classes.description: Provides financial data tools for the agent.

methods.name: print_response
methods.description: Method of the Agent class to generate and output a response based on a prompt.
